argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | efgval.w | |- W = ( _I ` Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 2 |  | efgval.r | |- .~ = ( ~FG ` I ) |
| 3 |  | efgval2.m | |- M = ( y e. I , z e. 2o |-> <. y , ( 1o \ z ) >. ) |
| 4 |  | efgval2.t | |- T = ( v e. W |-> ( n e. ( 0 ... ( # ` v ) ) , w e. ( I X. 2o ) |-> ( v splice <. n , n , <" w ( M ` w ) "> >. ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | efgred.d | |- D = ( W \ U_ x e. W ran ( T ` x ) ) |
| 6 |  | efgred.s | |- S = ( m e. { t e. ( Word W \ { (/) } ) | ( ( t ` 0 ) e. D /\ A. k e. ( 1 ..^ ( # ` t ) ) ( t ` k ) e. ran ( T ` ( t ` ( k - 1 ) ) ) ) } |-> ( m ` ( ( # ` m ) - 1 ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2 | #P_efger | |- .~ Er W |
| 8 | 7 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> .~ Er W ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> A .~ X ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_ercl | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> A e. W ) |
| 11 |  | #P_wrd0 | |- (/) e. Word ( I X. 2o ) |
| 12 | 1 | #P_efgrcl | |- ( A e. W -> ( I e. _V /\ W = Word ( I X. 2o ) ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( I e. _V /\ W = Word ( I X. 2o ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> W = Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 14 | #P_syl5eleqr | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> (/) e. W ) |
| 16 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> B .~ Y ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_efgcpbl | |- ( ( A e. W /\ (/) e. W /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( ( A concat B ) concat (/) ) .~ ( ( A concat Y ) concat (/) ) ) |
| 18 | 10, 15, 16, 17 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( ( A concat B ) concat (/) ) .~ ( ( A concat Y ) concat (/) ) ) |
| 19 | 10, 14 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> A e. Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 20 | 8, 16 | #P_ercl | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> B e. W ) |
| 21 | 20, 14 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> B e. Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_ccatcl | |- ( ( A e. Word ( I X. 2o ) /\ B e. Word ( I X. 2o ) ) -> ( A concat B ) e. Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 23 | 19, 21, 22 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( A concat B ) e. Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_ccatrid | |- ( ( A concat B ) e. Word ( I X. 2o ) -> ( ( A concat B ) concat (/) ) = ( A concat B ) ) |
| 25 | 23, 24 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( ( A concat B ) concat (/) ) = ( A concat B ) ) |
| 26 | 8, 16 | #P_ercl2 | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> Y e. W ) |
| 27 | 26, 14 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> Y e. Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 28 |  | #P_ccatcl | |- ( ( A e. Word ( I X. 2o ) /\ Y e. Word ( I X. 2o ) ) -> ( A concat Y ) e. Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 29 | 19, 27, 28 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( A concat Y ) e. Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 30 |  | #P_ccatrid | |- ( ( A concat Y ) e. Word ( I X. 2o ) -> ( ( A concat Y ) concat (/) ) = ( A concat Y ) ) |
| 31 | 29, 30 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( ( A concat Y ) concat (/) ) = ( A concat Y ) ) |
| 32 | 18, 25, 31 | #P_3brtr3d | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( A concat B ) .~ ( A concat Y ) ) |
| 33 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_efgcpbl | |- ( ( (/) e. W /\ Y e. W /\ A .~ X ) -> ( ( (/) concat A ) concat Y ) .~ ( ( (/) concat X ) concat Y ) ) |
| 34 | 15, 26, 9, 33 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( ( (/) concat A ) concat Y ) .~ ( ( (/) concat X ) concat Y ) ) |
| 35 |  | #P_ccatlid | |- ( A e. Word ( I X. 2o ) -> ( (/) concat A ) = A ) |
| 36 | 19, 35 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( (/) concat A ) = A ) |
| 37 | 36 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( ( (/) concat A ) concat Y ) = ( A concat Y ) ) |
| 38 | 8, 9 | #P_ercl2 | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> X e. W ) |
| 39 | 38, 14 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> X e. Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 40 |  | #P_ccatlid | |- ( X e. Word ( I X. 2o ) -> ( (/) concat X ) = X ) |
| 41 | 39, 40 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( (/) concat X ) = X ) |
| 42 | 41 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( ( (/) concat X ) concat Y ) = ( X concat Y ) ) |
| 43 | 34, 37, 42 | #P_3brtr3d | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( A concat Y ) .~ ( X concat Y ) ) |
| 44 | 8, 32, 43 | #P_ertrd | |- ( ( A .~ X /\ B .~ Y ) -> ( A concat B ) .~ ( X concat Y ) ) |
